The wiki defaults to the British convention for floor numbering: Ground floor, first floor, etc. This may be changed by clicking the moon icon at the top right of the site.
This article is about the quest. For the building, see Clock Tower (building).
 This quest has a quick guide found here.
It briefly summarises the steps needed to complete the quest.
Clock Tower (#29)
Released 17 June 2002 (Update)
Members Yes
Quest series None
Official difficulty Novice
Lead developer(s) Tom W

Clock Tower is a quest that takes place in the Ardougne Clock Tower. The tower's mechanism has stopped working, and you are asked to retrieve its missing parts from the dungeons.

Contents

  • 1 Details
  • 2 Walkthrough
    • 2.1 Starting out
    • 2.2 Obtaining the blue cog
    • 2.3 Obtaining the black cog
    • 2.4 Obtaining the red cog
    • 2.5 Obtaining the white cog
    • 2.6 Finishing up
  • 3 Rewards
  • 4 Transcript

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Talk to Brother Kojo in the Clock Tower south of East Ardougne.
Official difficultyNovice
DescriptionHelp the confused Brother Kojo find the missing cogs and fix his watch tower. Search the dungeon using brawn and brains to correctly place the four cogs.
Official lengthVery Short
Requirements The ability to run past level 53 Ogres
Items required
  • Bucket of water (obtainable during quest) or ice gloves
Recommended
  • 15 Combat level
  • Stamina potions
  • Ardougne cloak
Enemies to defeat None
{"requirements":"The ability to run past level 53 [[Ogre]]s","desc":"Help the confused Brother Kojo find the missing cogs and fix his watch tower. Search the dungeon using brawn and brains to correctly place the four cogs.","difficulty":"Novice","kills":"None","name":"Clock Tower","start":"Talk to [[Brother Kojo]] in the Clock Tower south of [[East Ardougne]].","length":"Very Short","items":"* [[Bucket of water]] (obtainable during quest) or [[ice gloves]]"}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Starting out[edit | edit source]

Talking to Brother Kojo.

Talk to Brother Kojo at the Clock Tower just south-west of the Ardougne Zoo. He will tell you that the clock is broken and that you need to find four different coloured cogs from the dungeon beneath the tower to fix it.

Go down the ladder in the room to the south.

Then head through the passage to the north-east until you see four large coloured tiles on the floor. These tiles will indicate which direction the corresponding coloured cogs are.

Note: Players cannot carry more than one cog at a time, regardless of colour.

Obtaining the blue cog[edit | edit source]

The ladder, just behind the camel cage.

The blue cog is locked inside of a cell with a dungeon rat. You need to find another way to get to it.

The location of the blue cog.

Go outside of the Clock Tower and head north-east to where Brother Cedric is (from the Monk's Friend quest) just south of the Ardougne Zoo. If you forgot a bucket of water, this is where the bucket and well are. You will notice a ladder just south of the camel cage from the Ardougne Zoo, around the oak tree.

Go down the ladder and follow the long, winding passage until the end, until you get to a wall that you can push. Push the wall to get inside and pick up the blue cog.

Climb up the ladder in this cage and you'll find yourself south of the Clock Tower.

Head back inside and climb the stairs to the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] and use the blue cog with the blue spindle.

Obtaining the black cog[edit | edit source]

Items needed: A bucket of water or ice gloves.
The location of the black cog.

Go back downstairs and down the ladder in the Clock Tower, then head through the north-eastern door from the tile room and go as far east as you can until you see several level 2 spiders.

You will see the black cog surrounded by short walls of fire. This is where the bucket of water or ice gloves come in handy.

To pick up the cog, you may either use the bucket of water with the cog or simply wear your ice gloves. This will cool the cog down so that you can pick it up.

After getting the black cog, head back to the ladder where you first entered, but don't go up. You should see four spindles near the ladder; use the black cog with the black spindle.

Obtaining the red cog[edit | edit source]

Optional items: Food and armour.

The location of the red cog.

Head through the south-eastern door, indicated by the red tile and walk down the passageway until you see some Ogres.

The red cog will be on the floor where the Ogres are. Run over and pick it up then return to the ladder where you came from.

Climb up to the ground floor[UK]1st floor[US] and use the red cog on the red spindle. The spindles are located on a column beside the ground-floor ladder.

Obtaining the white cog[edit | edit source]

The location of the white cog.

Return to the tile room and head through the north-western door, indicated by the white tile and follow the outer passageway until you find some rat poison (consider taking an extra for Ratcatchers, or you can make one when you need it with kwuarm and red spiders' eggs).

Pick up the poison, then go north-east down the long passageway until you see two levers near the dungeon rats. Pull the levers up to open the rat cage. Then head through the two gates and use the poison that you picked up before with the food trough.

The dungeon rats will eat the poisoned food and begin to die. Wait until they've all died, and then you'll find that the gate to the west has become unhinged. Head through the western gate until you find the white cog. Pick it up and use the ladder nearby to appear outside of the Clock Tower.

Go inside and climb to the topmost floor. Now, use the white cog with the white spindle on the top floor.

Finishing up[edit | edit source]

Once you've placed all of the cogs on their corresponding spindles, head back to Brother Kojo, and he will reward you.

Note: To keep duplicates of the cogs, after putting the cogs on the clock spindles, but before completing the quest, reobtain each cog in the same way as before. Once the quest is completed, cogs can not be picked up from the spawn or if the duplicate is dropped.

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • 1 Quest point
  • 500 coins

Transcript[edit | edit source]

This article on a quest has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations encountered throughout the quest.

'''Clock Tower''' is a quest that takes place in the [[Clock Tower (building)|Ardougne Clock Tower]]. The tower's mechanism has stopped working, and you are asked to retrieve its missing parts from the dungeons.

==Details==
{{Quest details
|start = Talk to [[Brother Kojo]] in the Clock Tower south of [[East Ardougne]].
|difficulty = Novice
|description = Help the confused Brother Kojo find the missing cogs and fix his watch tower. Search the dungeon using brawn and brains to correctly place the four cogs.
|length = Very Short
|requirements = The ability to run past level 53 [[Ogre]]s
|items = 
* [[Bucket of water]] (obtainable during quest) or [[ice gloves]]
|recommended = 
* {{SCP|Combat|15|link=yes}}
* [[Stamina potion]]s
* [[Ardougne cloak]]
}}

==Walkthrough==
===Starting out===
[[File:Clock Tower - Brother Kojo.png|thumb|220px|Talking to [[Brother Kojo]].]]
Talk to [[Brother Kojo]] at the [[Clock Tower (building)|Clock Tower]] just south-west of the [[Ardougne Zoo]]. He will tell you that the clock is broken and that you need to find four different coloured cogs from the dungeon beneath the tower to fix it.

Go down the ladder in the room to the south.

Then head through the passage to the north-east until you see four large coloured tiles on the floor. These tiles will indicate which direction the corresponding coloured cogs are.

'''Note:''' Players cannot carry more than one cog at a time, regardless of colour.

===Obtaining the blue cog===
[[File:Clock Tower - Ladder.png|thumb|220px|The ladder, just behind the [[camel]] cage.]]
The [[blue cog]] is locked inside of a cell with a [[dungeon rat]]. You need to find another way to get to it.

[[File:Clock Tower - Blue cog.png|thumb|220px|The location of the [[blue cog]].]]
Go outside of the Clock Tower and head north-east to where [[Brother Cedric]] is (from the [[Monk's Friend]] [[quest]]) just south of the [[Ardougne Zoo]]. If you forgot a bucket of water, this is where the bucket and well are. You will notice a ladder just south of the [[camel]] cage from the [[Ardougne Zoo]], around the oak tree.

Go down the ladder and follow the long, winding passage until the end, until you get to a wall that you can push. Push the wall to get inside and pick up the blue cog.

Climb up the ladder in this cage and you'll find yourself south of the [[Clock Tower (building)|Clock Tower]].

Head back inside and climb the stairs to the {{FloorNumber|uk=1}} and use the blue cog with the blue spindle.

===Obtaining the black cog===
{{Needed|A [[bucket of water]] or [[ice gloves]].}}
[[File:Clock Tower - Black cog.png|thumb|220px|The location of the [[black cog]].]]
Go back downstairs and down the ladder in the Clock Tower, then head through the north-eastern door from the tile room and go as far east as you can until you see several level 2 [[Spider carcass|spiders]].

You will see the [[black cog]] surrounded by short walls of fire. This is where the [[bucket of water]] or [[ice gloves]] come in handy.

To pick up the cog, you may either use the bucket of water with the cog or simply wear your ice gloves. This will cool the cog down so that you can pick it up.

After getting the black cog, head back to the ladder where you first entered, but don't go up. You should see four spindles near the ladder; use the black cog with the black spindle.

===Obtaining the red cog===
'''''Optional items:''' [[Food]] and [[armour]].''
[[File:Clock Tower - Red cog.png|thumb|220px|The location of the [[red cog]].]]
Head through the south-eastern door, indicated by the red tile and walk down the passageway until you see some [[Ogre]]s.

The [[red cog]] will be on the floor where the Ogres are. Run over and pick it up then return to the ladder where you came from. 

Climb up to the {{FloorNumber|uk=0}} and use the red cog on the red spindle. The spindles are located on a column beside the ground-floor ladder.

===Obtaining the white cog===
[[File:Clock Tower - White cog.png|thumb|220px|The location of the [[white cog]].]]
Return to the tile room and head through the north-western door, indicated by the white tile and follow the outer passageway until you find some [[rat poison]] ''(consider taking an extra for [[Ratcatchers]], or you can make one when you need it with [[kwuarm]] and [[red spiders' eggs]])''.

Pick up the poison, then go north-east down the long passageway until you see two levers near the [[dungeon rat]]s. Pull the levers up to open the rat cage. Then head through the two gates and use the poison that you picked up before with the food trough.

The dungeon rats will eat the poisoned food and begin to die. Wait until they've all died, and then you'll find that the gate to the west has become unhinged. Head through the western gate until you find the [[white cog]]. Pick it up and use the ladder nearby to appear outside of the Clock Tower. 

Go inside and climb to the topmost floor. Now, use the white cog with the white spindle on the top floor.

===Finishing up===
Once you've placed all of the cogs on their corresponding spindles, head back to [[Brother Kojo]], and he will reward you.

'''Note:''' To keep duplicates of the cogs, after putting the cogs on the clock spindles, but before completing the quest, reobtain each cog in the same way as before. Once the quest is completed, cogs can '''not''' be picked up from the spawn or if the duplicate is dropped.
